meanings.definition: A mixture of enzymes produced by the pancreas that aid in the digestion of food.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed pancreatins to help with my digestion.
meanings.sent2: She takes pancreatins after meals to assist in digesting her food.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled the pancreatins on my sandwich, making it easier to digest!
meanings.sent4: Her stomach growled like it was hungry for the pancreatins to start working.
meanings.sent5: The pancreatins worked like little helpers in breaking down the food in her stomach.

meanings.definition: A substance containing pancreatic enzymes used as a dietary supplement.
meanings.sent1: The health store sells pancreatins for those needing extra enzymes.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes take pancreatins to aid in their digestion and performance.
meanings.sent3: I sprinkled a bit of pancreatins on my salad for an extra health boost!
meanings.sent4: Her energy levels soared after starting to take the pancreatins regularly.
meanings.sent5: The pancreatins supplement helped her body absorb nutrients more efficiently.
